products.title: Linden Steel Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The linden grey roller blind will really enhance any window you put it in, the unique leafy pattern combined with the dark grey gives the blind a unique style. Its a great alternative if a normal dark grey roller blind just doesnt quite do it for you. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Belmont Silver Roller Blind
products.description: The belmont silver roller blind will add both texture and style to your windows with its beautiful silver and grey contrast. The stripes offer a unique twist on a classic grey roller blind and will really add some personality to your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Veil Pebble Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The veil pebble voile blind has a destinctive grey tone and stripe running down the fabric which is a plain smooth finish. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Haze Soft Grey Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The haze soft grey blind is a soft and subtle grey colour that blends into the background of your window. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Pura Pebble Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The pura pebble voile blind is a lovely soft grey colour which has a soft texture to it. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in.

products.title: Delicate Mist Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The delicate mist voile blind is the purest white sheer blind we offer in their range. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Capella, Carbon Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The wonderful thing about carbon silver is that it manages to combine the charm and sophistication of two metallic finishes in perfect harmony. The silver shines under the light, and the carbon provides balance and stability that allows you to transition between more luxurious pieces as you move around the room. Use carbon silver in the dining room where it can partner your new glass dining table with chrome frame.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Roller Blind
products.description: This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.

products.title: Midas Stripe Blackout Shadow Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The midas stripe blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. Their shadow grey striped midas fabric is a mid-dark grey shaded blind. Perfect for making a statement within the home. Product id: sdb-rbx2284 fabric colour: shadow grey material: 100% polyester lining: white blackout backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes midas stripe blackout shadow grey roller blind in white/grey.

products.title: Anthology, Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: The natural weave of the anthology in moonstone gives you the best of it all; the benefits of a high quality dim-out blind, plus a light, outdoorsy feel. The grainy, woven fabric provides a blind that's built to last. Beige will match almost any dcor scheme, but the moonstone will look especially stylish in a contemporary country dining room, surrounded by deep browns and soft creams, or set against bolder reds in a cosy bedroom, where you can curl up and relax.

products.title: Kindling, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and with a refined combination of regal colour on show it can add anything you want to your decor too. The silver makes the perfect companion to coppers and golds. Use them as the finishing touches rather than the primary colours so that you don't overwhelm your interior.

products.title: Dune, Aztec Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Dune aztec stone is a fabric that we're proud to call their own, and it's easy to see why when you take a closer look at it. The minimalist design works in perfect harmony with the neutral base colour and relaxing shades of brown. Just what you need to soften the ambience in any room. If you want to create a look that instantly makes you feel at home then the bedroom is the ideal place for aztec stone.

products.title: Capella, Silver Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the contrast between the delicate silver thread of silver blush and the soft pink foundation fabric. It has that cute and cosy feel that all decor should, and yet it's the luxurious choice of pattern that really shines through and catches the eye. When you have your heart set on putting your own stamp on things it can be frustrating looking for your perfect match. We created silver blush for those of you looking to blend homeliness, luxury, and a little hint of country style.

products.title: Amor Dolphin Grey With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor dolphin grey and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Amor Shark Grey With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor shark grey and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor ironmonger and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Amor Antique Steel With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. Amor antique steel with haze soft grey double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor antique steel and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds.

products.title: Amor Stormy Grey With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor stormy grey and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Amor Soft Grey With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. Amor soft grey with haze soft grey double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor soft grey and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds.

products.title: Crosshatch, Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: Crosshatch silver combines a classic geometric pattern with a striking silver that is sure to make a little noise. It's a pattern that seems to reverse depending on the angle of the light, and one which is finished with aplomb by the slightly blueish quality of the silver threads. Combining silver with a dark charcoal is a great way to emphasise the elegance of the shimmer. It's all about giving the threads the platform they need to speak for themselves, so don't be shy about organising your room with this purpose in mind.

products.title: Karma, Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: If you are looking for a dark and moody colour that still adds some light and sparkle to your home, karma taupe could be just what you need. The background glistens and shimmers, making any space feel alive and energetic. And at the same time the matt finish of the trees give it a slightly sombre and tempered feel. A truly thought-provoking contrast. Take your time with taupe, and look to add matching patterns to your wallpaper and scatter cushions.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: Moonstone from their anthology (blackout) range allows you to introduce a blend of white, beige, and grey to your colour scheme with the click of a button. Its intricate weave and clever patched style of colouring provides a depth and subtlety to proceedings that you perhaps weren't expecting. Take your decor down the contemporary meets country route by adding in some stencil signs on the walls, shabby chic furniture, and a little cracked leather for good measure.

products.title: Morning Mist, Spring - Roller Blind
products.description: The morning mist spring is one of their most beautiful and finely crafted blinds. Made from a fine quality, lightweight fabric, spring is printed with a truly stunning range of life-drawn, blossoming wildflowers. Sure to add a sense of artistry that relaxes and entertains in equal measure, the natural colouring and designs of the spring make it an ideal addition to a country-themed kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Morning Mist, Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: Morning mist autumn is a beautifully crafted filter blind made from the finest lightweight fabric. Printed with a quite wonderful autumn-scape of wildflowers, this blind is sure to add a touch of artistry to whichever room in the house you choose to hang it. A perfect way to add some beauty to a room, the autumn would look striking in a living room or dining room, where you can show it off to friends and family as you relax in the evening.

products.title: Etching, Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: Etching pewter combines a contemporary geometric print with a more traditional textured look that gives your new roller blinds added depth and clarity. The way in which the light greys ebb and flow is sure to set your mind at ease, and leave you with plenty of time to consider how to elevate your decor further. Matching to pewter is all about being subtle with your colours, and clever with your use of space.

products.title: Garden City, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on a life of their own, unconstrained by thick outlines or crisp edges. When you want to create a theme that instantly sets your mind at ease there's no better way to do it than to embrace other urban finishes.

products.title: Ashanti, Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti haze is a high quality fabric combined with an effortlessly stylish, contemporary design. The stripes come in various widths, and features lilac, dark purple, fashionable charcoal, and timeless off-white. The way the lilac and dark purple play off one another will add style and character to your home. Why not use the ashanti haze in your bedroom to match your bed linen? Or perhaps use it in the kitchen, where it's uplifting tones are sure to catch the eye.

products.title: Ashanti, Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti crimson combines a top quality fabric with a modern, feel-good design, and alternating strip widths give this filter blind a clean, contemporary feel, whilst the crimson highlighting looks fantastic when contrasted against the black and light browns. Use the light brown backdrop of the crimson to match light and dark woods, as well as country-themed areas in the house. Then let the crimson stripes stand out on their own, and provide your room with a little dash of colour.

products.title: Abstract, Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Abstract stone gets its name from the texture that inspired it, and it's easy to see why. The timeless quality of stone is something that endures and inspires in equal measure, so what better basis for a great addition to your interiors? As the colours drift into one another you are left to ponder precisely how the delicate balance was struck. Matching to the abstract range is all about going in search of complimentary textures.

products.title: Visage, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you need when you want to create a space you never want to leave. Allow yourself to be inspired, and add plenty of matching light woody beiges to the mixing pot. This is their advice to you if you want to be able to reframe your living room and bedroom.

products.title: Ashanti, Olive - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours. The olive adds mellow green stripes to the backdrop of cream, grey, and black to form a cool, contemporary look. The olive is perfect for when you want to add a few dashes of natural green to a room, without dominating it with a pure green, one-colour blind. Why not make a virtue of the green stripes, and use the olive to subtly change the colour scheme of your room? Ashanti, olive - roller blind the ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours.

products.title: Daphne, Charcoal - Roller Blind
products.description: The daphne in charcoal is a simple and neutral blind with a pretty and wistful dandelion fairy patterning. The fabric is soft and light, so light can filter through even when the blind is closed, and the smooth, effortless rolling mechanism makes for durable, easy-to-use window covering. Pair the charcoal with light browns and soft taupes in the bedroom, for a fresh, natural dcor style. Or instead, complement creams and golds to create a luxurious yet not over the top living space or dining room.

products.title: Luster, Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of luster grey is the way in which it breaks up the traditional single colour fabrics with dashes of white. It gives the whole blind a larger than life quality that lets the light flow around your room without saturating the existing colours. Introducing other finely detailed finishes would be an inspired choice if you want to continue the theme around the room. Look to the natural world for inspiration by focusing on the huge variety of wood grains that you can introduce with your furniture and flooring.
